titleStmt.title: An additional Act for bringing in all arrear, and also the growing dutie of excise, new impost, customes, subsidies and prize-goods, until the first day of October 1659.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

titleStmt.title: An additional Act for bringing in all arrear, and also the growing dutie of excise, new impost, customes, subsidies and prize-goods, until the first day of October 1659.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Field and Henry Hills, printers to the Parliament. And are to be sold at the seven Stars in Fleetstreet over against Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Wednesday, June 22. 1659. Ordered by the Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. ..
Caption title; ornament above caption; inital letter; text in black letter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
